name: Krishnasree Menon â™¥ Rahul Krishna
tagline: The Placeholder website that will be used widely.
body:
#Krishnasree Menon
Hailing from Kasargod in India. Currently pursuing B.Tech in Biotechnology from Vellore Institute of Technology. Certified to be an Awesomeness-Spreader and Involuntary-Charmer!

#Rahul Krishna
Hailing from Calicut, the place where Vasco da Gama landed!,. Enrolled in B.S in Computer Science at Vellore Institute of Technology. But in no way pursuing it!
Frontend Developer. You can visit him at <http://rahulakrishna.github.io>!

#The Story
Much to be told! But in short,
- We met
- Hated each other
- Grew closer and started loving.
- Did all sorts of crazy things together.
- Realized that can't do a thing without one another!

![An image of us together is supposed to show up here!](http://krishnasreemenon.github.io/images/TJ29.jpg)

##This page will be updated with content for clients once Github approves Krishnasree's student pack.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
